intro: Santiria yunnanensis, commonly known as Yunnan santiria, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its daisy-like flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, often found in mountainous regions. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while its flowers range in color from white to pale yellow. Santiria yunnanensis is valued for its ornamental qualities and has been used in traditional Chinese medicine.
